issue.title: [Python] Make more objects weakrefable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9469](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9469). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, some PyArrow objects (like Array) are weakrefable, but others (like Buffer) are not. There's no reason not to allow that, it just needs the required (short) boilerplate.
